alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 5:03AM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
